sentence: As Breitbart News reported in January, a Wyoming straw poll has Cheney losing to the Trump-backed Harriet Hageman.
author: Paul Bois
title: Trump Blasts Reps. Nancy Mace, Liz Cheney at South Carolina Rally

sentence: The Trump-backed choice is Harriet Hageman, a land-use attorney and former candidate for governor.
author: John Fund
title: Democratic Interlopers Could Diminish Trump's Clout in GOP Primaries

author: Herb Jackson
title: Trump targets outraise challengers, unlike some other incumbents
